import React from 'react'; import './Reminders.css'; import { Info, Bell, Clock } from 'lucide-react'; const reminders = [ "Medicine", "Doctor appointment", "Bedtime", "Exercise", "Medication", "Meals", "Drink water", "Monthly payments", ]; const notifications = [ { name: "Medicine", enabled: true }, { name: "Drink water", enabled: true }, { name: "Pension status update", enabled: false }, { name: "Bank visit", enabled: true }, { name: "Bill payments", enabled: true }, { name: "Eye check-up", enabled: false }, { name: "Booking confirmation", enabled: true }, ]; export default function Reminders() { return (

Reminders & Notifications

Reminders
    {reminders.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
Notifications
    {notifications.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
); }
